item.title: Trump suggests cutting China tariff rate to still-high 80% ahead of Switzerland talks
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and other U.S. officials are set to speak with counterparts from China at a meeting in Switzerland this weekend.

item.title: Trump backs tax hike on the rich, but says GOP 'probably' shouldn't do it

item.title: Retired Supreme Court Justice David Souter dies at 85
item.description: An appointee of President George H.W. Bush, Souter spent more than 19 years on the Supreme Court.

item.title: Jeanine Pirro picked Trump as interim top federal prosecutor in DC
item.description: Ed Martin was the second Trump nominee in as many days to be pulled after it appeared they would not have the Senate votes to be confirmed.
